front.title: Protecting Internet Key Exchange Protocol version 2 (IKEv2) Implementations from Distributed Denial of Service Attacks

abstract.t: This document recommends implementation and configuration best practices for Internet Key Exchange Protocol version 2 (IKEv2) Responders, to allow them to resist Denial of Service and Distributed Denial of Service attacks. Additionally, the document introduces a new mechanism called "Client Puzzles" that help accomplish this task.
